# MaxUsdPreviewSurface — Property Reference
# USD Preview Surface material for interchange workflows.
# Use with set_material_property / set_material_properties

## Base
diffuseColor : color                    # (color R G B) — base color
diffuseColor_map : texturemap           # texture slot
metallic : float                        # 0.0-1.0
metallic_map : texturemap
roughness : float                       # 0.0 = mirror
roughness_map : texturemap
useSpecularWorkflow : boolean           # true = specular color mode

## Specular (when useSpecularWorkflow = true)
specularcolor : color
specularColor_map : texturemap

## Opacity
opacity : float                         # 0.0 = transparent, 1.0 = opaque
opacity_map : texturemap
opacityThreshold : float                # alpha cutoff

## Emission
emissiveColor : color
emissiveColor_map : texturemap

## Clearcoat
clearcoat : float                       # 0.0-1.0
clearcoat_map : texturemap
clearcoatRoughness : float
clearcoatRoughness_map : texturemap

## Normal / Bump / Displacement
normal_map : texturemap                 # normal map slot
bump_map_amt : float                    # normal/bump strength
normal_flip_red : boolean               # flip R channel
normal_flip_green : boolean             # flip G channel
displacement : float
displacement_map : texturemap

## Occlusion
occlusion : float
occlusion_map : texturemap
ao_affects_diffuse : boolean
ao_affects_reflection : boolean

## IOR
ior : float                             # index of refraction
ior_map : texturemap
